comment.author: 81594342@N00
comment._content:
Well, besides of being kitsch as hell I wouldn't have felt quite comfy wearing a full pack of dead German shepherds around my neck.

Do they first check if they are really _dead_ before putting them on? Otherwise there would be danger of the whole thing running away. I guess it would have been a good idea to always carry a gun with you for cases like that.

(Yeah, I know I have a weird sense of humour)
